# LDS02 Generation Report

## Framework Upgrade Complete
- **Driver**: LDS02 v2.1.0 (Dragino)
- **Framework**: v2.2.9 → v2.4.1
- **Template**: v2.3.6 → v2.4.1

- Explicit key arrays for data recovery
- Safe iteration patterns implemented
